bio: Pr贸spera Grant Program for Funding New and Emerging Projects.
contributionDescription: My contributions to OP would be building and testing DApps on the Optimism Mainnet, and begginning to create a community of builders around the OP stack, the plan is to with the grant money run a round to fund on development DApps built with the OP stack in the Island of Pr贸spera
impactDescription: Since it's a begginning emerging project I have not yet run a round or help funded a new project so I can't say there were contributions done yet, and in the future there will be of course, the impact goal is to fund the development of new dApps on the Optimism Collective.

fundingSources.description: Pr贸spera has had investments up to 100M, CBNGrant Program (my project, have not)

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for promising future impact, which is against the rules of the grant program. The applicant mentions that future contributions and impact will occur if they receive the grant.
